function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Association between disease outbreaks and urban governance","Impact":"Inequality of power relations in the making of the built environment and in the diagnosis, treatment, and protection of citizens from disease","Mitigation":"Public participation in urban planning and governance, equitable access to healthcare, and community-based disease prevention programs","Technologies":"Data analytics for urban planning, telemedicine for remote healthcare access, and public health surveillance systems","People":"Citizens, marginalized communities, and public health organizations","Owner":"Urban planning authorities, healthcare providers, and government agencies"}]}
